channel.title: Clients
channel.description:
[b][u]Just so I don't bother you, i'll just cut to the chase;
I changed my PATH and CLASSPATH variables lately, and now I can't use any clients. (my JRE version is JRE6)
What should the variables be?[/u][/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2009, 10:04:44 am[/size][hr][img]http://i615.photobucket.com/albums/tt233/CanYouStzkeMyHeart/errorclientpath.jpg[/img]
Well, that's the reason I want to solve this problem, I can't run ANY client.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2009, 10:07:23 am[/size][hr]Please help me. :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2009, 10:14:25 am[/size][hr]Please...?

item.title: Clients
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“OmgPkdFTW, post:1, topic:278485”]I changed my PATH and CLASSPATH variables lately, and now I can’t use any clients.
(my JRE version is JRE6)[/quote]
Tell us your classpath.
It should be: C:\Program Files\Java\jre6

Your path should be the standard Windows directory and this at the end: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13;

Read full topic
